goblin.name: Goblin

abilities.nimble_escape: Can take Disengage or Hide as bonus action on each turn

attacks.scimitar: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, 1d6+2 slashing damage
attacks.shortbow: Ranged: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft, 1d6+2 piercing damage

goblin.tactics: Uses nimble escape to hit and run, prefers ranged attacks, flees when outnumbered

goblin_boss.name: Goblin Boss

abilities.redirect_attack: When creature boss can see targets boss with attack, can use reaction to redirect to another goblin within 5 ft

attacks.scimitar: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, 1d6+2 slashing damage
attacks.javelin: Melee/Ranged: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft or range 30/120 ft, 1d6 piercing damage

goblin_boss.tactics: Commands other goblins, uses redirect attack to protect self, fights to the death to maintain leadership

orc.name: Orc

abilities.aggressive: As bonus action, move up to speed toward hostile creature

attacks.greataxe: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft, 1d12+3 slashing damage
attacks.javelin: Melee/Ranged: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft or range 30/120 ft, 1d6+3 piercing damage

orc.tactics: Charges into melee using aggressive trait, prefers greataxe, fights brutally and rarely retreats

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.languages: Understands languages it knew in life

attacks.shortsword: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, 1d6+2 piercing damage
attacks.shortbow: Ranged: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft, 1d6+2 piercing damage

skeleton.tactics: Uses ranged attacks when possible, vulnerable to bludgeoning weapons, mindlessly follows orders

wolf.name: Wolf

abilities.keen_hearing_smell: Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks using hearing or smell
abilities.pack_tactics: Advantage on attack roll if ally within 5 ft of target

attacks.bite: Melee: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, 2d4+2 piercing damage, target must succeed DC 11 Strength save or be knocked prone

wolf.tactics: Uses pack tactics with other wolves, attempts to knock prey prone, retreats when alone and badly wounded

dragon_wyrmling_red.name: Red Dragon Wyrmling
dragon_wyrmling_red.senses: Blindsight 10 ft, Darkvision 60 ft, Passive Perception 14

attacks.bite: Melee: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft, 1d10+4 piercing damage plus 1d6 fire damage
attacks.fire_breath: 15-foot cone, DC 13 Dex save, 7d6 fire damage (half on success), recharge 5-6

dragon_wyrmling_red.tactics: Opens with fire breath, uses flight advantage, arrogant but cunning, may negotiate if clearly outmatched
